content.detailedDescription:
I was in a parked car with 2 friends in a yard on the suburbs. i was in the backseat listening the radio one saturday at 1 or 2 o'clock (am).
my 2 friends who were sitted in the front seats start to say... "what is that...Oh men...Whats that light!!!". i got up and looked trough the glass... and i saw it.
in front of us, at 3 or 4km starts a 700m mountain with a red light on his top, well, the ufo was 200 or 300meters above that light, it was like a "little sun" , a red-orange glowing ball wich made mad turnings at incredible speed, one time... it seemed to fall with gravity acceleration but stoped instantly and continued makin turns.From hovering,the ufo flew more than 20cms in our perspective in less than 1 second, who means more than 10km in real distance,braking instantly and making other 10perspective cms in the opossite way, it did random turns during 2 minutes.
at last, the ufo flew to our right (north direction) and we lose it, we get out from the car and ran to see it but we couldt target it no more.
i am a veteran soldier of the spanish army, i was in afghanistan and in a lot of exercises , i used ir devices and marked zones to helis and planes, i know how seems the ordinary airplanes ... and it wasnt a plane or heli, it had imposible acceleration and braking.One friend who was sitted in the front was soldier too in the spanish air force with beacon works in the airstrip and hangars and he was impressed like me.
we also know that the ufo wasnt above the mountain, we guess it was a lot of km behind the mountain at higer altitude, we were in getxo heading west so we guess the ufo was above cantabria, the neighbour province, we saw the ufo above the mountain cause the perspective...We guess.
content.summary: A light over a mountain turning abruptily at high speeds with impossible braking and hovering.

content.detailedDescription:
Three nights in a row we saw a small lead color object in our backyard. it smoothly flew at sofet level and within inches of the houses. it came from the neighbors on my east to the neighbors to the west. it made no noise. it was about 18"- 24" long and about 4"-6"wide. i dont know how thick it was. my son saw it two nights in row and said he saw it both times around 10:45pm. so i went and stood in the dark, hiding behind our camper approximately 15' from our house. and i saw it! i was awe struck. i couldn't move. it was quite quick but not speeding, maybe a very brisk walking speed. our houses are the same heights and this object just followed the edges of the roofs. i watched for about 10 seconds. once it got to the end of my neighbors house it veered off to the side. i think i was in shock as to what i saw as i didnt even think to run out to the street to see where it went. it's shape was much like a cell phone turned on its side as it was rectangular but the corners where rounded. my son said that when he saw it had some kind of glow or emitted light. i saw a dark lead like color and smooth object.
so that's my very very close ufo experience. i would like to know what it was and why it was in my backyard. is someone being observed or abducted in my neighborhood, is it me? kind of scary. but very exhilarating! it was not a man made drone! this was five years ago, we didnt have such things then. this object had no motor, propellers, or anything. it was incredible. i still wonder if it knew i was watching it. we didnt see it again.
content.summary: K yard watched object come from neighbors house past my house at sofet level past other neighbors then veered off at end of neighbors house. three nights in a row.  steady quiet rectangle lead color

content.detailedDescription: I go outside to smoke and, if it is nighttime and not cloudy, i look up in the sky because i can sometimes see satellites flying overhead. this time when i went out, i was looking for a possible satellite when one suddenly appeared a little to the sse of me, mostly south heading in a mostly northerly direction at about 80 degrees south by 89 degrees east(that is off of vertical). as i watched it, i noticed a high flying plane, probably above 20,000 feet up. as i noticed the plane, i also noticed that the light i was watching dimmed and almost faded out. at first i thought it might be high clouds but the stars were not dimmed so it couldn't be that. i have never seen a satellite dim like that, the light is always steady. after a few seconds, the light began to get brighter. after the light was bright again, i continued to watch it and then it started dimming again. at this point it was almost directly overhead just a little to the east by maybe 1 or 2 degrees. suddenly it seemed to slow a little but i assumed it was just my eyes imagining it until it suddenly changed direction and started heading due east. i have never seen a satellite do that before. it moved east for a few seconds till it was at about 85 degrees off of directly up and suddenly stopped. i closed my eyes for a moment to make sure i was not seeing things and looked again and sure enough it was not moving anymore. at this point i had to come to the conclusion that there was absolutely no way this was a satellite. i continued to observe it for another couple of minutes to see if it might start moving again but it didn't and then came inside.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It appeared to be a satellite at first

content.detailedDescription: 8:30pm getting out of the pool looking to the east and noticed 3 red orange lights then a 4th light some distance further away appeared.  later i went outside to get something from my car and noticed another light in the sky suddenly a string of 3 lights appeared with a 4th off in the distance. we see a lot of crazy things lately in the sky out here...
content.summary: Like the phoenix lights

content.detailedDescription:
We were watching fireworks during a canada day celebration over canada's wonderland  - an amusement park when we noticed a glowing orb appear in the north west. the object alternated green and red lights that seem to pulsate from it and did not have any strobes or standard aviation lighting. as i work in aviation i noted this was not a conventional aircraft. 
at first i thought it was a drone but the hight didn't match. 
we began hearing people around us saying what is that and within a few minutes people were shouting and pointing also taking video. 
i had my iphone with me and started shooting within a minute or two after it first appeared so the quality in is as you would expect. 
the object made no sound of any type. 
towards the end of the video it changed its lighting pattern from alternating green and red to just a red glow and began tracking south west and became erratic. 
the object appeared to  be landing but then ascended again. 
we recorded 12 mins and 30 seconds. 
there were four of us in the car my kids immediately noticed it and so did the kids next to us. 
i'm sure many people saw this but we noted at least 40-50 people taking note and yelling.
content.summary: Observed glowing orb while watching fireworks

content.detailedDescription: I was taking photos in and around the hickory airport, this photo was taken toward highway 321 near the catawba river bridge.The unit appeared to be traveling at a very high speed.Such high speed can not be observed with the human eye. only with the aid of the digital camera is it possible to capture such images. i had one other frame that showed the subject approaching, it traveled approximately 5 miles in less than 2 seconds.The subject appeared to be around 100 feet in length, a small black dome in the center, the color of the body was tan. there was a viable power field in front as if pulling and on each side power fields pushing up and back. the unit appeared to be pulling energy into the body, this may explain why no sound was heard.The weather was great with a high ceiling.No air traffic in or out of the airport at the time. no unusual feelings, in fact i had a very blessed day.
content.summary: Unit not viable to the human eye. appears flat,dome in ctr, power field in front and on each side.

content.detailedDescription: Saturday june 28th 2014 in ridgway, pennsylvania at 11:30 pm. my 67 year old neighbor dave lewis (i think 67)  and i (i'm 31)  were sitting in lawn chairs in front of his garage when his wife who is 10 years older yelled from the porch to look up in the sky. she came running down and before you know it most of the people in the neighborhood came out and watched 3 saucer shaped objects burning bright reddish orange darting around in the sky for about 20 minutes. after about 15 minutes several planes formed a large circle around 2 of the objects they disappeared and reappeared or were just flying so fast it was ridiculous. they were the size of an aircraft carrier or 4. dave claimed they had to be above 34,000 feet . it was a clear night and you could see all the stars.We were in ahww in how they flew so fast and were burning so bright. they made no sound. then suddenly a 3rd object came then they all headed west so fast it was incredible. the planes circled and flew off after them but couldn't even come close to the speed these objects were moving. also a few of what we all agreed were fighter jets came from the south in a v formation and shot out after the objects. by the time we had a camera it was all over. then today i was on reddit and found this link about altoona ufos and it brought me here. the video does not do justice to what we saw. today i went to my local pub  to have a beer and an off duty nurse who was talking to her son and he started talking about how he was camping saturday and that a group of his friends (around 30 of them) saw ufos. i listened to what he said and he described the same things i had seen. also after interrupting their conversation and finding out where he was camping i figured he had saw them after our sighting and that he was in a direct line west about 5 miles from where we sat. i have been to many airshow with my grandpa a ww2 vet i have never seen anything like it in my whole life. i didn't know anything that big could move that fast. we all talked about it for an hour afterwards and came the conclusion that they were some kind of flying ship because they seemed to have an intelligent person or something behind some controls. we also agreed that the ufos were aware that the planes were tailgating them and following them and when they were surrounded decided to haul ass.
content.summary: 3 large saucer shaped flying objects glowing redish orange

content.detailedDescription: 6/29/14.Took my dogs out back to go the bathroom. my backyard faces north. i looked up to the east and saw a orange yellow light moving slowly to the north. light would fade slightly but stay visible. at one point it looked as if a small red light fell from it. no fireworks were going at that time and a roman candle wouldn't last that long. no sound quietly moved across the tree line enough for me to see. a report similar to this from grosse point. good hour plus from my house. they said it was south of them. right before one of my trees could block my sight it disintegrated. at first i thought maybe it was a lantern you light with a match and let go. but those move straight up and the wind was dead that night. this all happened in 20 seconds and it was too intriguing to run back in the house to get my phone to record it. the picture i posted with this is from today 7/1 and that is my backyard and tree line the light was visible from. small grey cloud at the 11 o'clock position was where the light disappeared.
content.summary: Moved slow and disintegrated after 20 seconds

content.detailedDescription: On the morning of july 1st, 2014 i was heading north on cass ave in willowbrook illinois to get on the highway to go to work. at the time i was driving past the property that argon national lab is located on. i first noticed the object because it was reflecting the sunlight in a way that seemed to make it glitter; easily visible against the clear blue sky. at first i thought the object was a plane but thought it was strange that it was reflecting light in the way it was. upon further observation, i determined that the object didn't seem to be following any sort of linear path, but instead seemed to be maintaining its position for the entire duration of the observation. the object appeared to be a thin elliptical shape that was spinning along its horizontal axis. this is not my first time witnessing a strange object like this, however it is my first time seeing something like this by myself. i wasn't scared but instead felt curious and wanted to keep watching it to see what it did. after watching it for less than a minute, i decided to call a family member and tell them what i was seeing. almost as soon as i had that thought, the object instantly vanished from sight leaving no trace that it had been there.
content.summary: Observed while driving past argon national lab. the object was roughly above the labs property

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were laying on the beach on a blanket around 2 am in mission beach, san diego, ca. we were snuggling and conversing when i noticed on the horizon (looking towards the ocean) a red light appear suddenly. then i noticed a few other colored lights attached to the same object--white and amber. the lights were blinking. at first i thought it was a ship on the horizon. however, after blinking for about 20 seconds, all of the lights disappeared suddenly. i thought that maybe this ship had sailed too far to the west over the horizon that i could no longer see it. a few minutes later, these lights appeared suddenly again. they blinked for a good 20-30 seconds and disappeared suddenly again. over the course of about 15 to 20 minutes, this happened a total of four times. the first three times, the lights appeared in the same location and didn't move much but rather seemed to hover. on the last occurrence we noticed that these lights were moving rapidly to the south. in an attempt to think logically about what this could possibly be, my husband and i concluded that a ship that far in the distance couldn't possibly cover that much distance at that high of speed. after the lights traveled south for about ten seconds, they disappeared altogether. we continued to observe this area for another 30 minutes but the lights never reappeared. we reasoned that there was no other explanation for what we saw other than that it had been a ufo.
content.summary: Ufo sighting off the coast of mission beach, san diego

content.detailedDescription: I was at home. ther was a filing , like somebody coling me out. i saw somebody. he was so in brit white color. we spoke. about spaceship. he told me, that dont have a food. mabe i was on this spaceship. i dont remember for now.Dont know why. i remember the eyes, all dark, maybe black. he just left me. iwas whiwt the dog.
content.summary: I saw and met an alien.

content.detailedDescription:
Walking
looking up to sky
fire works
5 round lights in sky, floating on air for about 3 minutes, desintegrating one at a time.
feeling enthusiastic, at the same time telling myself i should have brought my camera out that night.
blurred away slowly, being the brightest, the last to disappear.
content.summary: 5 lights floating in sky, blurring away 1 at a time, with the brightest one disapearing the last.

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and my wife were travelling home (very late fall - at dusk) when we noticed a large beam of white light shining downward from the clouds above the power transfer station for the local hydro electric dam (about 1/2 mile away on the hilltop. the beam shone to ground level. it was a dull, overcast evening with low clouds. at first i thought the beam was a spotlight from a helicopter that often scans the power lines for hot spots, etc. then, it occurred to me that the beam was way too wide for a conventional spotlight. it was too wide for the largest spotlight - it was between 50 and 100 yards wide. i pulled over to the roadside and slowed to a stop and looked again with concentration. the factor that makes me believe it was of ufo origins was that the beam of light withdrew slowly upward into the clouds. it was as if i were watching a cartoon. light, as we know it, is either on or off - we cannot visually comprehend the speed of light. light can be bright or dim; but we cannot see it withdraw when a light is turned off. this was an extremely wide beam that withdrew slowly into the clouds (almost in slow motion) from where it was emanating. the sides and bottom appeared to be laser edge straight. i could not see an object nor hear anything unusual. the beam just disappeared into the low clouds. after a short period when it did not re-appear we continued on home.

i actually phoned the local provincial police detachment in our village when i arrived home (about 10 minutes later) to see if they had received any reports of unusual sightings. they did not indicate that they had.

i am curious to know if any other similar sighting reports have been made? although this is several years after the fact it is probably something i will never forget. seeing a television program that made me aware of mufon encouraged me to make this report.

i do not believe that any natural phenomenon could replicate the slow retraction of light.

thank you
content.summary: Large beam of light withdrew into clouds above power transfer station

content.detailedDescription:
Vivo en sanlucar de bda.  en la avenida de la atalaya, un camino que lleva a un antiguo cortijo a la salida de sanlucar, entre las carretera  hacia trebujena y carretera de jerez.
el caso viene a ser que cuando salgo de mi trabajo, voy al gimnasio y suelo llegar tarde, pero este d��a llegue algo mas temprano, sobre las 21:40 o poco mas. al entrar en mi casa aun no hab��a llegado mi mujer y mi hijo y el perro, rufo, estaba inquieto, deseando salir. sin cambiarme de ropa, con las mayas de ciclo-in, cog�� la correa del perro y salimos de mi casa hacia el final del camino. siempre llevo al rufo amarrado por el camino por si pasa alguien, alguna moto o coche y cuando paso la ultima casa lo suelto. el perro en el momento de verse libre siempre tiende a correr como un loco por el campo, pero el este dia se quedo quieto a mi lado. para que corriese coji un palo que estaba junto a mi y lo lance al campo. algo se movi��, cre�� que seria un conejo y pens�� que el perro al verlo ir��a a por el. al mirar al perro segu��a junto a mi lado y le grite "vamos rufo". 
algo volvi�� a moverse y en esta ocasi��n segu�� el movimiento del forraje con la vista asta que al llegar a la altura del camino vi perfectamente la silueta de, lo mas parecido a un hombre, de color gris oscuro, que en una posici��n como de firmen militar, cruzaba el camino a unos 10 metros de mi, perdi��ndose  el movimiento entre unos invernaderos.
quise ver algo mas pero entonces, al final del camino, a la altura del cortijo de la atalaya vi como una luz como un faro potente que se acercaba por el camino y luego ascend��a perdiendo poco a poco su brillo y ganando velocidad.
pense que el ser que yo vi era imposible que uniese llegado asta la luz para macharse en ella y que pod��a estar aun por all��. el cortijo podr��a encontrarse a unos 800 metros desde donde yo estaba y mirando hacia el cortijo el ser paso de izquierda a derecha. 
me entro en este momento mucho miedo y me volv��. por cierto el perro ya me estaba esperando en la puerta de casa.
content.summary: Humanoide tumbado color plomo 2,5mt desplaza reptando y cruza el camino, luz anaranjada sobre el camino y ascendiendo

content.detailedDescription:
I closed my eyes and the paralysis started. i was atop my bed and my husband was in the living room, watching television. they like "visiting" me when my husband's in the other room. i grabbed my neck, to stop the feeling it makes on my skin, and the next thing i knew, i woke up and it was morning. i'd not even gotten up to go to the bathroom! i don't recall my husband coming to bed, even. but i knew, as soon as i woke up, "they'd" put something inside my hip that felt like a tiny rod, and it radiated outward, like it was shooting out my energy or something.

talk about pain! i've been to a doctor, a chiropractor, taken ibuprophin, and been physically ill since then.

and on the night of june 20, about the same time, i woke up to see four of those little buggers standing and looking at me like "whoa! we're in deep trouble now!" i immediately said, "no! no! do not take me to your space ship! go, in the name of jesus!" and that was it!

but they'd still left that object inside my hip!

i read on here that a space craft was spotted not too far north of where i live, a few days before this. coincidence? i doubt it.

and that is my report. there is strength in the name of the lord!
content.summary: I was abducted, apparently, on june 19 and

content.detailedDescription: On sunday night june 29 at about 10:05 pm my dog woke me up to let him outside. i walked out my front door and noticed lighting in the distance near the waupaca area. as i was looking in that direction i noticed a small round bright light heading in my direction. i thought it was plane at first since the waupaca airport is in that area (about 18 miles from my home) but as it got closer, i realized that it was not a plane but a round lit up object that was similar to a bike tire with many spokes that were all lit up in different colors, and blinking white lights all around the outside ring. it continued to come towards my property at a steady level only about 40 feet above the ground, moving at about 5 mph.And even with a steady wind it was not affecting its movement. it was about the size of a hula hoop (maybe larger) and the thing that most amazed me was that it did not make any sound. when it was right across me in my yard (about 20 yards away) it went over the top of my shed, barely clearing the top of it by about 5 feet, and continued thru my back yard and small woods just above the tree tops. once it passed my property, all the lights (spokes included)kept blinking on and off until i could not see it anymore as it headed towards new london and beyond the trees. i told my wife and several co-workers the next morning and listened to the news hoping someone else had witnessed it but heard nothing. the only way i could explain the way it looked was to compare it to a small ferris wheel but with many more spokes, almost like a fireworks display contained in a round circle with blinking lights all around it. i went back inside with the dog and checked the time. it was 10:20pm.
content.summary: Saw a lighted ferris wheel shaped object fly right over my property

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i had just returned from our evening walk in corona ca., i walked out to our back yard to cool off. i was looking to the southern sky searching for satellites when this light travelling at a huge speed cut across the sky in a easterly path, the time was around 8:45 pm. pacific time, the object was at 40 degrees in the sky. there were planes in the area too far and slow to even keep up with this object, i don't think any of them might have been following or trying to intercept. the object was extremely fast, so fast i did not have time to reach for my binoculars.It lasted only a few seconds, it glowed and pulsated and was somewhat blurred ??? the sky was perfectly clear,it's shape was definitely saucer elongated shape and it left a slight trail or maybe it was the speed that gave that illusion?? it was very fast.
content.summary: Had just returned from a walk, sitting looking up i noticed this light, it was travelling east bound at a tremendous speed, it flew across my horizon in 5 seconds or less, it was too large for it's altitude and speed.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Just verifying story of other coastie rom acushnet. i saw it too. i reported it to ufoinfo.Org? if u google [youtube title removed/cms/tg] my stories there. definitely a cover up and threats they also took our log book and started a new one because i'd written it all down in ships log as was my job during any "general quarters" incident. i think we got too close to their underwater base���
content.summary: Disc shape, silvery, pulsating lights.

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving home friday night on the 5 freeway heading north from los angeles to kern county. we saw 3 large ufo's starting at about 7:40pm just before reaching pyramid lake on the 5 freeway heading north from valencia towards the grapevine. the sky was clear and we saw something that at first appeared to me a cigar shaped cloud. next we saw 2 more. they just hung there kind of at an angle to the ground, then the one closest to us rotated, there was a flowing fade in and out of lights and there seemed to be a light at one end. 
the approximate locations of the three were: #1 over the angeles forest west of the lake, #2 further northwest and #3 seemed to be over the 5 freeway going north away from the bakersfield area. 
#1 moved to #2 as if by a jump. it was in the blink of an eye. then it rotated.
i felt a little scared because no one driving seemed to notice or care and then #3 seemed to come closer to us. i think my wife was scared. 
i took these photos with a weak 50 mm lens after getting home. i was hurrying not to miss a photo chance and i drove up one of the nearby mountains 
i played around with the exposure to give a better view on the second photo.
we lost sight of the ufos because mountains blocked the view of 2 of the ufos and the third one seemed to move behind a mountain as well.
content.summary: 3 ufos appeared to be hovering in the sky near the 5 freeway in los angeles

content.detailedDescription: I was at my aunt's house, and my mom sent me text telling me to come home because we were going to have a bonfire. as we (me, mom, dad, aunt) were sitting around the fire, i was looking up at the sky trying to find stars and constellations i learned about last year in my astronomy class. a red orb appeared out of nowhere and slowly drift to the north for about 6 minutes before it disappeared. we all watched in amazement as it just disappeared. it was a solid red color. i attempted to take a photo with my smartphone that takes good low light photos, but it would not show up in the pictures.
content.summary: Red orb

content.detailedDescription: After taking my girlfriend for a little sunset drive in the foothills, on the way back to town just after getting on paved road i noticed what i thought was a plane in front of us in the sky, we thought it was weird cause it only had one red light flashing or pulsating. as it approached closer overhead it was a triangle with 2 bright white light on the back corners not flashing and as it passed over saw the 3rd white front light. i stopped and shut off the truck in the road(birch creek) heard no noise and a plane this close would be heard. my truck had the doors off and top off. grabbed my phone to shoot some video and it just slowly headed east over the mountains.
content.summary: Black triangle flew over while driving just outside of  walla walla

content.detailedDescription:
Il ����tait environ minuit ce 25 d����cembre 1980 (lendemain du r����veillon - nous n'avions pas bu d'alcool). mon p����re et moi sortions les poubelles quand je lui fis remarquer cette intense lumi����re blanche pointant ���� l'horizon c����t���� sud. cette lumi����re qui ressemblait ���� celle d'une soudure ���� l'arc avan����ait tr����s vite pour rapidement se trouver au-dessus de nos t����tes presque ���� la verticale. c'est alors que nous pouvions distinguer 8/12 lumi����res rouges qui semblaient escorter la lumi����re blanche ����clatante. en l'espace + ou - d'une quarantaine de secondes l'engin disparaissait ���� l'horizon direction nord. les points rouge n'����taient pas sym����triquement plac����s autour de l'engin. j'en ai compt���� 8 alors que mon p����re qui avait une meilleure vue que moi en a compt���� 12. 
nous ����tions ���� la campagne ���� l'ext����rieure d'une maison situ����e en dehors de la ville de chateauneuf sur loire et sans lumi����res parasites. le ciel ����tait noir sans nuages et il n'y avait aucun vent. nous savions que ce ne pouvait ����tre un avion ou tout autre engin connu. il ����tait parfaitement silentieux et l'ensemble paraissait beaucoup trop grand pour ����tre un engin volant connu.
nous ����tions imm����diatement convaincus qu'il s'agissait d'un vaisseau spatial mais sans pouvoir en dire davantage.
ma r����action a ����t���� d'appeler ma soeur ���� plus de minuit au risque de la r����veiller pour lui dire que nous venions de voir un ovni.
le lendemain matin, mon p����re et moi sommes all����s ���� la gendarmerie pour y faire une d����claration. bien que les gendarmes connaissaient mon p����re qui ����tait un notable de la ville, n'ont pas cru bon de prendre notre d����position.
de retour ���� paris, j'ai donc fait un rapport que j'ai envoy���� au gepan.
j'����tais drh ���� l'����poque dans un soci����t���� am����ricaine qui travaillait pour l'otan et j'avais une habilitation "secret d����fense". 
le lendemain de l'observation les cha����nes de tv faisaient ����tat de milliers de t����moignages de ghien ���� meung sur loire en passant par orl����ans. un ivrogne a ����t���� interview����, d����cridibilisant ainsi l'observation puis le journaliste a conclu qu'il s'agissait d'un satellite russe qui retombait sur terre. mon p����re et moi-m����me ainsi probablement que les autres t����moins, nous sommes sentis insult����s. notre point d'observation ����tait id����al et les conditions tr����s favorables.
ce n'est que r����cemment que j'ai fait un lien direct avec l'ovni de rendlesham qui a atterri au uk le matin du 26 d����cembre 1980. je pense que ce pouvait ����tre le m����me car celui que mon p����re et moi avons observ���� se dirigeait dans cette direction.
content.summary: A

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at the camp fire listening to my neighbours daughter play guitar and a huge glowing circular orb appeared in the sky descending with a black trail and then disappeared
content.summary: Glowing orb

content.detailedDescription:
Ocurrio el pasado dia 21 de junio de 2014 en la capital cordobesa.
eran cerca de las dos y media aproximadamente de la madrugada cuando regresabamos a casa mi pareja y yo despues de dar un paseo por dicha ciudad cuando de repente detras nuestra podimos escuchar a un grupo de personas entorno dos o tres repetir sin cesar que mirasen al cielo.
justo en ese momento cuando levantamos nuestras miradas pudimos contemplar como cinco o seis puntos de luz naranjas se desplazaban despacio en linea recta e iban desapareciendo uno a uno tornandose esas luces naranjas en tonos verdosos y apagandose por completo hasta desaparecer uno a uno siendo asi el primero hasta el ������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������ltimo. aquello no se parecia a nada visto antes ya que un avion se perderia de vista y estos objetos desaparecieron delante nuestra. 
he de decir que en el video no se llega a apreciar la intensidad con la que se apreciaban dichos objetos pero eran de un naranja destellante.(objetar que cuando alguien toma una foto a la luna ya sea con dispositivo movil nunca llega a apreciarse como en realidad la estamos percibiendo)
el movil con el que se tomo el video fue un lg optimus g .
sin nada mas que decir y ya por ultimo, encontre en internet casos parecidos al mio y fotografias similares a lo que aquella noche se contemplo.
content.summary: Cinco bolas narajas que atravesaban el cielo direccion norte a sur en linea recta

content.detailedDescription:
I looked outside my window at 11:24 pm and saw a bright star-like object that was changing colors, red, white, blue, green, yellow. i first thought it was a plane, but the lights made me think otherwise. the object was hovering above the red aircraft warning lights that are on top of the mountain. after observing the object for some time i began to notice that it was slowly moving. it was now to the right of the red aircraft warning lights. heading north and ascending very slowly. after 2 hours the object is still in view. slowly heading north. i watched the object for over 2 hours, i found it very fascinating and mysterious. it wasn't a plane, or a helicopter, or a star, or planet. it was an object or "orb" that was being controlled by something, that's all i can be sure of.

i never lost sight of the object. it is still in the sky as i type this report. still headed north. cannot continue observation of object because its late and i need to sleep.
content.summary: Bright star-like object that changes colors. red, white, blue, green, yellow. object hovered, ascended, and headed north

content.detailedDescription: Description of event same as above. i was outside smoking a cigarette when i followed this star taking an oval like track in the sky moving too fast for anything at that apparent altitude. could be explainable, no zigzag or sudden stop or start, speed was regular. i lost sight of it when my house got in the way. i guess im reporting in the event it could be verified by a known celestial body scheduled to fly over my house. if not then all the more interesting.
content.summary: Star, higher than commercial aircraft, made elliptical flight from nw sky to se sky in 20 secs

content.detailedDescription:
At 12:10am on june 30th, 2014 in greenpoint, brooklyn, ny, my wife and i went out on our patio for a cigarette. i went out before her, lit my smoke and from the top of the stairs to our patio, my wife asked asked ���what are those? they aren���t planes.��� i looked up to where she was pointing to the ssw. there were two orangish orbs that were flickering slightly. the first thought i had was that they were chinese lanterns. however, the hair on the back of my neck stood up as i realized that they were moving towards us and, far too fast to be any sort of lantern or balloon. the objects appeared to be at 2,000 - 3,000 feet in altitude, moving at 200-300 miles per hour towards nne. the two objects traveled silently and in apparent formation, perhaps 2,500 feet apart. they traveled at a constant rate and did not change bearing.

as the objects approached, not quite overhead, but maybe offset by about 15-degrees from directly overhead, i noticed that the glowing, flickering orange nearly disappeared and i was able to observe the underside of the objects, which appeared round in shape with a dark center and a ring of somewhat dim, fuzzy light around it. the two objects disappeared behind our building. i considered running through the front of the apartment to see if i could observe the objects on the other side of the building, but decided against it. my wife ran inside to grab her camera. she returned just as a third orb appeared and followed a similar vector to the other two objects. again, as the third object passed nearly overhead, i observed the same structure as the first two objects. my wife was able to get one very nondescript, streaked image with her camera but honestly, it doesn���t look like much.

the entire incident lasted perhaps 1 minute and 30 seconds. after the three objects had passed, my wife and i were somewhat shaken and tried to make any sense of what we had just seen. they clearly were not any sort of aircraft or drone that i have seen (and i consider myself an aircraft aficionado along with being a drone and r/c aircraft pilot). the other thought i had were that perhaps they were some sort of debris entering the atmosphere and burning up, but that would not account for what appeared to be a level flight path and lack of a tail.

about a minute or so after this, a commercial aircraft crossed the flight path of the objects at a perpendicular angle, heading east. i have no idea if the pilot of that airliner, likely landing at jfk, was able to see what had just occurred, but i suppose we have no way of knowing. we checked the internet for any other reports of this incident and found nothing, which is astonishing considering it occurred over new york city.
content.summary: Three objects over brooklyn, ny
